snippet: This summer, for women in Midtown Manhattan going to work or out for midday shopping, the long, sensuous jersey dress or skirt is a dominant look.
abstract: Bill Cunningham observes that long, sensuous jersey dresses or skirts are dominant look among New York City women.
lead_paragraph: This summer, for women in Midtown Manhattan going to work or out for midday shopping, the long, sensuous jersey dress or skirt is a dominant look.
